title: Google Smart Lock Overwrites Hulu Login
content:
Hello there Everyone!

I am setting up my new Google Pixel 4a and I went to login to Hulu with my family Hulu account information (which is under my mom's email) and I can not figure out how to do it.  The system gives me two options - "Start your free trial" and "Log out of Hulu" and when I go to log out of Hulu it just gives me the "Google Smart Lock" information and will not actually hold on the login screen.  Has anyone else encountered this problem?  I need to be able to use services not only under my personal email address.

Your help is greatly appreciated!

Jenna
